WRITING.TITLE: Scariest Japanese horror?
WRITING.TEXT: I am fairly new to foreign horror movies and am looking for the scariest japanese horror movies you've seen, so far I've seen: Audition, Noroi the curse, Marebito, Ju On, Pulse, Shutter, Ringu, Dark Water, Three extremes, Imprint, I saw the devil Tetsuo

WRITING.TITLE: Your favorite recent horror movies 2016-2017?
WRITING.TEXT: My top favorite horror movies ive seen recently are The Witch, The autopsy of jane doe, The devils candy, The Conjuring 2, The monster, Dont breathe, The belko experiment, Train to busan, 10 cloverfield lane, The neon demon, Life The Wailing, Green Room, Baskin, Split, The Void.

WRITING.TITLE: Suggestions for some in your face action packed horror movies?
WRITING.TEXT: I need some suggestions on some action packed, in your face, edge of the seat, bloody horror movies. Movies like 28 days later, 30 days of night, REC, The Descent, V/H/S.

WRITING.TITLE: Why does "30 days of night" have such a low rating?
WRITING.TEXT: I personally love this movie and I was just wondering why it has such a low rating? it stand at 51% https://www.rottentomatoes.com/m/30_days_of_night/
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AGXROHRLXGU
Its worth a watch but its not a movie that would be worth repeated viewings
I personally thought the mockbuster "Paranormal Entity" was better than all the paranormal activity movies.
I meant movies with bad ratings in general. Ill give it a watch
Do you think it is due to not enough people watching the movie thus not getting a full rating like it should?

WRITING.TITLE: What are some movies with bad ratings/reviews that you still like?
WRITING.TEXT:
There are some movies that have received horrible reviews and ratings but I still enjoy, I was just wondering what were some of yours?
Mine are: Antiviral, Blood Creek Saw 2 and 3, Visions, Ghost Ship, Pet semetary 2, I know what you did last summer,Paranormal Entity, Tusk, Lost River, Nothing left to fear, Pride and glory, Dead Silence, The gray man......
Thats an estimate, and it was on movieinsider not google bud.
Well when I searched it up on google there was no release date information. So I am not sure what planets google search your on.

WRITING.TITLE: Why do you guys think Chris took his own life?
WRITING.TEXT: I am a big fan of Soundgarden and Chris Cornell, I am very fortunate to have seen Soundgarden live once in Vancouver a couple years back. I just can't stop asking myself the question of why he would commit suicide, anyone have any thoughts to why he would commit suicide? I just don't see why he would leave his kids behind and it just does'nt add up to me that he was talking about his next upcoming show only to commit suicide right after.
I thought it was great

WRITING.TITLE: Anyone know when "The Devil's Candy is going to be released on Dvd and Bluray?
WRITING.TEXT: I was just wondering If anyone knew whne "The Devils Candy" is coming out on dvd and Bluray

WRITING.TITLE: My favorite episodes so Far
WRITING.TEXT: I am on season episode 16 right now. So far my favorite episodes are the Pilot, Fire, Tooms, and Fresh Bones. I have a couple other favorite ones I just can't remember the names of the episodes.
Too rube to be true
I understand why it is such a good movie but I personally don't think it is that great. Watch "Under The Skin" It is a must see sci-fi film.
Split was great Get out was alright.

WRITING.TITLE: Nielsen survey available(Video Does Not Appear or play) Bad Survey
WRITING.TEXT: Im really getting angry with these nielsen surveys, its the same survey that keeps appearing but you cant complete it due to the video for the survey not appearing.

WRITING.TITLE: Looking to collaborate/write guitar to some songs
WRITING.TEXT: I am 23 and I have been playing guitar for 13 years, I am looking to collaborate with other musicians or record some guitar tracks to some songs.

WRITING.TITLE: Anyone know how long the gift cards are on sale for?
WRITING.TEXT: I am not sure if it is just in Canada or everywhere, but the 10, 15, 25, 50, and 100$ gift cards are are sale right now. I was wondering if anyone knew how long they are going to be on sale for?
You can download it online but i'm pretty sure other region dvds dont work in region 1 dvd players
Damn that sucks. The Curse is my favorite, was looking forward to getting it on dvd

Nope the first movie is Ju-On The: Curse. If your'e not to all familiar with the original films it started with two shorts called Katasumi and 4444444444 and then came the films: Ju-On:The Curse, Ju-On: The Curse 2, Ju-On: The Grudge, Ju-On The Grudge 2. Then Takashi Shimizu(Creator/Director) went on to directing the american remake of Ju-On The Grudge calling it just The Grudge. They are still continuing to make Japanese versions of the film as well I haven't seen them yet though.

I just find it weird cause I would get them the next day after ordering them all the time, this is the first time it has taken this long to receive my gift cards

So why am I not getting mine?
Thursday and Saturday, but for a while I was getting every gift card I ordered the next day by 12 am.

WRITING.TITLE: Swagbucks card delivery system still down?
WRITING.TEXT: Still havn't received my 5 gift card yet and it is now wednesday. Anyone get a heads up on whats going on?
Everytime I've ordered one it usually arrives the next day. Apparently they are experiencing a technical problem with the Gift Card delivery system right now though.

I live in Canada and used to get at least a full page a day of Ncrave playlists, then the pages started to disappear. Now they have completely disappeared and there is only the stupid Ngage playlist which I don't even bother with.
I was wondering what was going on, I have been waiting for 2 since thursday and saturday but other people said they have received theres the other day. I have not yet.
The ones I ordered were Canadian, so I am assuming since it is a site based out of the US you guys get cards faster. I am not sure though
Us or canada?

WRITING.TITLE: Anyone else waiting longer than usual for gift cards?
WRITING.TEXT: Got two amazon.ca gift cards this last thursday and thought I would get them on friday if not monday for sure, still haven't gotten them. Lately I've been getting them before or by 12 Am the next day after ordering them.

WRITING.TITLE: [Question] Interface/How to eliminate direct sound from monitor and monitor only return from software?
WRITING.TEXT: I bought a This Usb Computer interface/3 channel mixer http://artproaudio.com/mixers/product/usb_mix-ps/ and I need help on how eliminate the direct sound from the monitor and monitor only the return from software while using the headphone jack? The manual doesn't explain how to do it. I would like to use programs such as Amplitube and guitar rig but I can't because I am getting 2 different channels the direct sound from the monitor and the processed guitar on amplitube.
No obviously you didn't pay attention lol
I found it pretty frightening, maybe you need to watch it again.
I think they purposely made it non-linear to change up the same horror writing formula. It seems pretty linear the way you would have preferred.

WRITING.TITLE: Ordered item March 19th and it is now April 15th, will it still arrive?
WRITING.TEXT: I bought a dvd off of a third party seller and I have purchased off of them a couple times and have gotten my dvds within a week, but for some reason this one hasn't come yet. I was just wondering if it is still going to come or what? It was shipped from the U.S with Fed Ex and I live in Canada, if it is at customs will they still eventually send it out?
